name: Ricetta: kourayaki di uova di granchio
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Crab Roe Kourayaki.

value.name: Granchio
value.desc: Un crostaceo che vive accanto all'oceano. La sua deliziosa carne friabile pu√≤ essere utilizzata per preparare dei piatti appetitosi.

value.name: Uova di granchio
value.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

value.name: Kourayaki di uova di granchio
value.desc: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The meat and roe are mixed evenly, before being garnished with plump crab legs. The happiness that flows forth from that first bite imparts meaning upon your prior forbearance.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the World Quest "The Gourmet Supremos: The Seashore Strider"</color>
